summary: Diff shows updates to PracticePage route param handling/validation and some query-hook gating, but does not provide clear evidence that per-question delete UI was removed from Contributor Panel, nor that backend read-only endpoints are accessible to unauthenticated users. Navigation fix from ChapterCategorySelectPage to PracticePage is not evidenced in the provided file diffs.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove the ability to delete individual questions from the Contributor Panel UI (remove any delete/trash controls, the delete confirmation dialog, and any wiring that triggers single-question deletion).
missing_requirements.reason: ContributorPage still appears to include delete-related UI dependencies (e.g., Trash2 icon, AlertDialog components). The diff snippet is truncated and does not show removal of per-question delete controls/dialogs or deletion wiring.

missing_requirements.requirement: Starting practice from ChapterCategorySelectPage navigates to PracticePage with subject, chapterId, and category correctly populated (no 'Invalid Practice Session' error).
missing_requirements.reason: PracticePage now reads subject/chapterId/category from route params, but the diff does not include ChapterCategorySelectPage (or equivalent) changes showing that navigation now passes the correct route params. Without that, the end-to-end navigation restoration is not confirmed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Allow read-only access to chapter/question query endpoints used by the student flow so unauthenticated users can load chapters/questions and see contributor-created questions.
missing_requirements.reason: backend/main.mo is truncated and the diff does not show any authorization-guard changes on chapter/question query endpoints (e.g., getChaptersBySubject, listChapters, getQuestionsByChapterAndCategory, getQuestionsByChapterCategoryAndYear). Frontend hook gating changes do not demonstrate backend unauthenticated access.
